Package com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App

Class ESPSteering

java.lang.Object
com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App.ESPSteering
All Implemented Interfaces:
MqttCallbackListener
public class ESPSteering extends Object implements MqttCallbackListener
This class parses the ESP32's Accelerometer/Gyro-Value-Strings received through the MPU_TOPIC, so that the GameLogic Class can access that data to calculate game-physics etc.

  • Method Details

    • startSensors

      public void startSensors()
      This method tells the mqttManager instance of this class to subscribe to the mpuTopic so that this class starts to receive the mpu6050 data

    • stopSensors

      public void stopSensors()
      This method tells the mqttManager instance of this class to unsubscribe to the mpuTopic so that this class stops receiving the mpu6050 data

    • onMessageReceived

      public void onMessageReceived(String topic, String message)
      This method implements the onMessageReceived method of the MqttCallbackListener interface. It is supposed to handle message it receives on the subscribed topics.
      Specified by:
      onMessageReceived in interface MqttCallbackListener
      Parameters:
      topic - an MQTT topic
      message - the message the MQTT topic published

    • onConnectionLost

      public void onConnectionLost()
      This method implements the onConnectionLost method of the MqttCallbackListener interface. This method handles connectionLost errors
      Specified by:
      onConnectionLost in interface MqttCallbackListener

    • onConnectionError

      public void onConnectionError(String message)
      This method implements the onConnectionError method of the MqttCallbackListener interface. This method handles Exceptions that occur when the client isn't able to connect to the broker
      Specified by:
      onConnectionError in interface MqttCallbackListener

      public void parseAndAssignValues(String message)

      message - the message received on the mpuTopic
